DOC.brief_summary: The optimal strategy to restore sinus rhythm in patients with atrial fibrillation (AF) of less than 48 hours' duration is still controversial. The investigators performed a controlled single-center trial to compare electrical and pharmacological (propafenone) cardioversion to restore the sinus rhythm in selected patients with acute atrial fibrillation.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Electrical Versus Pharmacological Cardioversion in Early Atrial Fibrillation
